Title: Shotgun DNA sequencing of wastewater metagenome
design_description: Nextera XT DNA Library Prep Kit
ww_spike_in: ZymoBIOMICS High Microbial Load Spike-in Control I
ww_processing_protocol: pasturization, ultra filter concentrating pipette, Qiagen RNA extraction kit
ww_surv_target_protocol: PerkinElmer New Coronavirus Nucleic Acid Detection Kit v.7.0
description: DNA metagenomic sequencing of wastewater sample tested previously for SARS-CoV-2 via qRT-PCR
